video_title: How Jay Clouse Built a $500,000 ARR Community (in Less than 2 Years)

content_profile.title: How Jay Clouse Built a $500,000 ARR Community (in Less than 2 Years)

key_takeaways: Solution: Use forcing functions like cohort-based courses to create structured content (Difficulty: intermediate)
Solution: Help them understand revenue levers and business model options (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Study successful creators and translate insights to audience (Channel: content)
Strategy: Create cohort-based courses before self-paced courses
Strategy: Build intellectual property through frameworks and methodologies

startup_ideas.title: Meta-creator business helping creators monetize beyond advertising

startup_ideas.problem_solved: gap between content creation skills and business building skills
startup_ideas.validation: $500,000 ARR achieved in less than 2 years

market_gaps.title: Creators lack business model knowledge beyond advertising
market_gaps.solution_approach: Help them understand revenue levers and business model options

trend_opportunities.title: Cohort-based courses becoming standard for creator education
